amendment.description: To establish the National Counterproliferation Center within the National Intelligence Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3895 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3895 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S10342-10344; text: CR S10342-10343) To establish the National Counterproliferation Center within the National Intelligence Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3895 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3895 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Frist.
